reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and appreciate its style, with one noting it's professional-looking for work.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You c an dress it up or wear it casually. The dress is great!
items.body: Beautiful dress. The material is soft and comfortable. Love the pockets. I'm 108 lbs and ordered a small. It fits perfectly. Don't hesitate to buy, you will love the dress. Read more
items.author: Ed B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort, quality, and beauty.
items.body: Very happy with this dress. Quality is good. Size is accurate. I know i will be wearing this comfortable dress often. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Need a good dress for travel? This is it.
items.body: I like this dress very much: true to size and hangs gracefully and it's very comfortable. Anything with pockets is a big win! The fabric is a little heavy so not great for a hot summer day outside, but I've received several compliments when I wear it. Wonderful travel dress and easy to dress. up or wear casually with sandals. Read more
items.author: Mary A. Kreitzer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: I was very pleased when I got this dress. It fits well and the material is beautiful. Not too thin but just right for Summer. Not see through. The color was as expected and it looks very nice. Looks like it will be wrinkle free. I am short and cubby. 5 feet tall and 145 pounds with an ample breast. I got a size Large. It was just right. It is longer than midi on me but I expected that being so short. I comes to low thigh length. Not too long. Many times I have to hem things but this is just great. Read more
items.author: sjl

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice everyday dress
items.body: Fit well and was good for the price. Pretty colors. Did not like the sleeves though. Read more
items.author: Cherie985

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits well, good quality
items.body: I love the fit. It looks nice and is well made. Not see through at all Read more
items.author: Jill Harmon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and true fit
items.body: Love, love this dress. Fabric felt sort of slick till I washed it in the machine on a regular cycle and air dried, then it was soft and cottony. The teal color was as pictured, the fit was perfect, and the pockets were deep enough. The dress could be dressed up or down. I could sleep in it, which is my new criteria for clothes. Read more
items.author: Carol Sims

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely print.
items.body: Heavier fabric and stretchy. Medium fit was long on me because I am 5’1”. Came well below knees but above ankles. I will keep it; but, I thought a small would be too small for me on the top part of the dress. Lovely black and white print. I will hem it for shorter length. Can be dressed up or down for different occasions. Read more
items.author: bookworm

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, 01-green Printed, Wine Red Floral, Blue Yellow Bohemian, Purple Floral, Black, White Floral, Navy Blue, White Floral Blue, 02-green Round Dot, Green Leaf Floral, Rose Red, White Floral Black, Navy Blue Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
